## Pre-Merge Checklist

- [ ] `npx tsc --noEmit` — zero type errors
- [ ] `npm run lint` — zero lint errors
- [ ] `npm test` — all tests pass (1138+)
- [ ] Coverage thresholds not regressed (statements ≥ 80%, functions ≥ 85%)
- [ ] New code has corresponding unit/integration tests
- [ ] Swagger spec updated if API endpoints were added or modified
- [ ] `CHANGELOG.md` updated under `[Unreleased]`
- [ ] Roadmap updated if a phase item was completed
